Idea Forge

Sponsor

About

The CU Blockchain Summit is the first annual student summit for Colorado students interested in blockchain technology. The summit will feature workshops and panels with blockchain experts, networking with blockchain companies, and a 24-hour hackathon competition. It’s all happening April 14th and 15th at the Idea Forge on the CU Boulder campus. Registration is limited so register soon!

FAQ
All the important questions. Answered.

How much does the CU Blockchain Summit cost?

The CU Blockchain Summit is absolutely free to attend for students. Community members will have to pay a small admission fee. We will provide meals, snacks, and refreshments!

What if I have another question?

Tweet us at @CU_blockchain or drop us a line at blockchain@colorado.edu

Who can attend?

We welcome any student 18 or older to participate!

Will there be food?

Plenty, we will provide three meals a day as well as snacks, drinks, and caffeine.

What if I don't attend CU?

Students from all Colorado schools are welcome!

What if I am not a student?

We want to see community members at the event too! If you’re in the Boulder/Denver area please register and check the option that you are from the broader blockchain community

What should I bring?

In order to check-in, you must have a government-issued ID. But, you should also bring your laptop, laptop charger, phone, chargers, headphones, a pillow, toiletries, an extra set of clothes, and a reusable water bottle.
